more_content:
Being vegan or vegetarian isn’t as uncommon as it once was. Restaurants and cafés in New York are including vegan and vegetarian items in their menus that are just as good as the traditional options. Take a look at some popular eateries, many of them offering kosher and gluten-free alternatives!

For a Coffee Fix and Snacks

It’s easy to replace cow's milk with vegan alternatives, however, there’s something about cafés that go the extra mile to include vegan or vegetarian sandwiches, snacks or pastries.

Café Grumpy

Location: 224 West 20th St, New York, NY 10011
Vegan options, kosher certified coffee.

Franchia

Location: 12 Park Ave (between 34th and 35th St), New York, NY 10016
Vegan, gluten-free options.

Peacefood Café

Location: (Uptown) 460 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10024
(Downtown) 41 E 11th St, New York, NY 10003
Vegan, some gluten-free options.

For Full Vegan/Vegetarian Meals

Whoever said that vegans and vegetarians only eat salads or “rabbit food” were wrong, wrong wrong! These restaurants have crafted delicious dishes that are healthy, hearty and Instagram-worthy.

Sacred Chow

Location: 227 Sullivan St, New York, NY 10012
Vegan, organic and kosher certified.

Blossom

Location: (Chelsea) 187 Ninth Ave, New York, NY 10011
(Upper West Side) 507 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10024
Vegan, gluten-free options.

The Little Beet

Location: (Midtown West) 135 50th St, New York, NY 10020
(Midtown East) 320 Park Ave, New York, NY 10022
Vegetarian, seasonal, gluten-free, nut-free and vegan options.

Chennai Garden by Tiffin Wallah

Location: 127 East 28th St, New York, NY 10016
Vegetarian and kosher.

By Chloe

Flatiron: 60 West 22nd St, New York, NY 10010
Bleecker: 185 Bleecker St, New York, NY 10012
Vegan, kosher, gluten-free, nut-free options.

For Sweet Cravings

These vegan bakers know that butter, cow’s milk and eggs are not mandatory ingredients for baked goods. Explore just a handful of the best vegan desserts in the city.

Erin McKenna’s Bakery NY

Location: 248 Broome St, New York City, NY 10002
Gluten-free, vegan and kosher.

Van Leeuwen Artisan Ice Cream

Location: (Upper West Side) 448 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10024
(West Village) 152 W 10th St, New York, NY 10014
(East Village) 48 E 7th St, New York, NY 10003
Vegetarian, vegan options.

Chloe’s Fruit

Location: 25 E 17th Street, NY 10003
Vegan, certified kosher, gluten-free

Now that you know you won’t go hungry in New York, it’s time to finalize your plans. Check out the latest deals at The New Yorker Hotel.
title: Vegan and Vegetarian Food Guide to New York
